remarks: Derive axiom ~ ax-hvcom from Hilbert space under ZF set theory. (Contributed by NM, 27-May-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
axhil.1 $e |- U = <. <. +h , .h >. , normh >. $.
